meanings.definition: Farthest to the left within a political spectrum.
meanings.sent1: The ultraleft position on the issue was clear and unwavering.
meanings.sent2: Her ultraleft beliefs often clashed with those on the right.
meanings.sent3: The ultraleft picnic had only vegan options, even for the ants.
meanings.sent4: His ultraleft stance made him a lone wolf in the political landscape.
meanings.sent5: The ultraleft color on the map was a bold, striking red.

meanings.sent1: She always spoke in an ultraleft manner, pushing for radical change.
meanings.sent2: Their ultraleft policies aimed to redistribute wealth more equitably.
meanings.sent3: The ultraleft book club only read revolutionary literature.
meanings.sent4: His ultraleft ideas were like a storm in the calm sea of politics.
meanings.sent5: The ultraleft banner waved proudly at the protest, demanding justice.

meanings.definition: A person or group holding extreme leftist views.
meanings.sent1: The ultraleft gathered to discuss their plans for social reform.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the ultraleft in the activist community.
meanings.sent3: The ultraleft potluck was full of discussions on Marxism.
meanings.sent4: The ultraleft stood out in the crowd with their bold banners.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the ultraleft group felt like being in a passionate family.
